alert.note: Alert for Northern Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 06 at 1:25PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila County through 215 PM MST... At 124 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Payson, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Payson, Star Valley, Oxbow Estates, Round Valley, Flowing Springs, Mesa Del Caballo, Tonto Village, Freedom Acres, East Verde Estates, Ponderosa Campground, Houston Mesa Campground, Beaver Valley and Water Wheel Burn At Houston Mesa Rd-S. This includes the following highways... State Route 260 between mile markers 252 and 266. State Route 87 southbound between mile markers 244 and 251. State Route 87 between mile markers 243 and 261. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
